Ancestry-Half-Elf -- Female Half-Elf Novice Fighter
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d4 Strength: d12 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes: Flexibility: +1 Attribute Points
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Language (Elven): (sma) d8 Science: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d8 Performance: (spi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Language (Common): (sma) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Elven
Skill Notes:
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Fame: +1 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Edge: 4
Features
Edges (3 points): Danger Sense; Fame; Fighter Hindrances: Can't Swim; Cautious; Suspicious+ Half-Elf Features: Elven Magic; Flexibility; Low Light Vision
Feature Notes:
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Fame: 2x fee from performing
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Suspicious+: Allies suffer -2 on Support rolls
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d12+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d12+d6); Unarmed (d12+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Elven Magic: May reroll to resist powers
Martial Flexibility: May gain benefits of combat edge for 5 rd 1/encounter
